Returns: The color mode which is one of @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#COLOR_MODE_COLOR_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#COLOR_MODE_MONOCHROME_E@.
getColorMode().Description: Gets the color mode with which the image will be printed.

Returns: the PrintHelper to support printing images.
Parameters: Context: A context for accessing system resources.
PrintHelper(android.content.Context).Description: Returns the PrintHelper that can be used to print images.

Parameters: Uri: The Uri pointing to an image to print.
Throws: if Uri is not pointing to a valid image.
printBitmap(java.lang.String, android.ne.Description: Prints an image located at the Uri. Image types supported are those of @B_android#graphics#BitmapFactory#decodeStream_E@

Parameters: int: The page orientation which is one of @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_E@.
setOrientation(int).Description: Sets whether the image will be printed in landscape @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_E@ (default) or portrait @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_E@.

systemSupportsPrint().Description: Gets whether the system supports printing.

Parameters: int: The color mode which is one of @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#COLOR_MODE_COLOR_E@ and @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#COLOR_MODE_MONOCHROME_E@.
setColorMode(int).Description: Sets whether the image will be printed in color (default) @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#COLOR_MODE_COLOR_E@ or in back and white @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#COLOR_MODE_MONOCHROME_E@.

getScaleMode().Description: Returns the scale mode with which the image will fill the paper.

setScaleMode(int).Description: Selects whether the image will fill the paper and be cropped @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#SCALE_MODE_FIT_E@ or whether the image will be scaled but leave white space @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#SCALE_MODE_FILL_E@.

Returns: The page orientation which is one of @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE_E@ or @B_android#support#v4#print#PrintHelper#ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT_E@.
